resources.string: Go to Pebble™ on Play Store
The Pebble™ app is not installed on your device!
Can not send the file to Pebble™, if I can not write to storage first.
Did not receive any data about Pebble™ file to upload!

On December 7, 2016, Pebble™ officially announced that the company would be shut down and would no longer manufacture or continue support for any devices. This includes web-services (device initialization and registration, apps-store, weather, health, etc.). Luckily, Pebble™ and Fitbit™ recognize the upcoming Pebble-apocalypse and allowed the watch and the Pebble™ app to be configured with other web-services provides. Enter Rebble.io.

This app will help you set up you Pebble™ device using https://rebble.io and, optionally, setup Right-to-Left support using https://elbbep.cpfx.ca. This app will also fix the firmware/language-pack/pbw upload issue that the Android Pebble™ app has with newer version of Android.
